nio/Bitly.description: A block that creates a bitly url. Each input signal will be sent to output with the bitly link added on.

bitly_link_attr.title: Link Signal Attribute (out)
bitly_link_attr.description: Attribute to put bitly link on output signals. If unspecified, original link attribute is overridden.

link_attr.title: Link Signal Attribute (in)
link_attr.description: Attribute of inputs signals that contains a link.

default.description: Any list of signals. They should contain the attribute specified in the property `link_signal_attribute (in)`.
Input signals but with the attribute `link_signal_attribute (out)` set to the bitly link generated from the attribute `link_signal_attribute (in)`.
